page.title: 06LIFE IN NOTTINGHAM(SNEINTON)
page.content: I'm Asif Majid.I live in a terraced house.It has three bedrooms.It has a front and a back garden.I have one brother and two sisters and mum and dad in my family.My mum was born in Pakistan and my dad.All my family was born in Pakistan except my little sister Nazish.Me,mum,Najma and Amjid came to England about three and a half years ago now.My dad wakes up at 6 o'clock.He works in a factory called "William Lawrence" on Colwick Road.He makes things out of wood.My mum used to learn English at Greenwood Infant School but now she doesn't because she's got the baby.My mum goes shopping every Saturday to a store that's close to my house.There are a lot of small shops near my road on Sneinton Dale.
